name: Oneiric (ruumi)
description:
Oneiric is a platformer where you are told to run away from the monster Erudne for unknown reasons while clearing obstacles. You meet Noisave who instructs you to run from Erudne as fast as you can and not to let him “take you back”.

Release date: 23rd June 2022

Platform: Windows PC

Price: Free/Donation

Developer: Shizuka Artistry

Contact Information:

  • Twitter: @tsu_ruumi
  • Discord: ruumi#7969

Key Features:

  • Multichoice ending
  • Platforming

Studio Bio:

This was made by the game development branch from the creative team Shizuka Artistry. It was founded in 2022 by the head of design for Shizuka Artistry, Ruumi.

Controls: 

  • W and S to move the camera up and down.
  • A and D to run left and right.
  • SPACE to jump up and tapped again for a double jump.

Credit:

  • Music: Dova-Syndrome
  • SFX: Freesound
  • Developed by Ruumi

Special Mentions:

Dog
